Params: {3: 'There are no others in sight except Ayla in the long and narrow space station passageway.'}
{3: 'The lights flicker on and off. Dull, low battle noises could be heard occasionally, probably coming from other troops fighting the enemy.'}
{3: 'Ayla inhales a deep breath and starts to focus, trying to sense any possible signal from Selena.'}
{3: 'Ayla tries all sorts of communication methods but receives no replies.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Maybe Selena can't receive any signals... Yes, that must be it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's okay... I will find you, and I will bring you back...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla picks up her scythe and starts running...'}
